title: ChasmWaxing: A Startup, Cyber-Thriller
description:
__Chasm Waxing: A Startup, Cyber-Thriller (Chasm Trilogy Book 1)
by B. Michaels
B.Michaels Publishing | July 2016 | ASIN: B01IO5XQOY | 275 Pages | True PDF | 1.5 mb

Chasm Waxing is the first novel in the Chasm Trilogy. Itâ€™s a realistic, apocalyptic, cyber-techno-thriller; ripped from todayâ€™s headlinesâ€”projected into the year 2020.

Startup kids, Becca Roberts and Josh Adler, work for companies selected by the NSAâ€™s new venture capital and startup accelerator firm. However, the NSA Directorâ€”General Shields, uses the accelerator to pursue a vendetta against ISIS. ISIS beheaded his only son.

But the Iranian Quds Force Commander, Muhammad Rahmati, employs his own novel ideas to defeat ISIS.  Heâ€™ll use the victory as a springboard to build a new, technically-savvy empire.  A crescent moon waxes in the Middle East.  Becca, Josh, General Shields, and Rahmati engage in their first confrontation, impacting the global balance of power.

Chasm Waxing explores the burgeoning technologies of virtual reality, artificial intelligence, gamification, augmented reality, hacking, Bitcoin/ Blockchain, self-driving cars, encryption, robots, and quantum computing.

About the Author:
B. Michaels is an entrepreneur, executive, technologistâ€¦and nowâ€¦a new author. He's spent a number of years working in the US Government and Fortune 1000
